tool_description: Conducts comprehensive risk assessment by analyzing background checks, references, interviews, and other screening data to determine volunteer placement safety and suitability.

applicant_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer applicant

role_risk_level.description: Risk level of volunteer role (low, medium, high)

vulnerable_population.description: Whether role involves working with vulnerable populations

red_flags.description: Any red flags identified during screening process

mitigating_factors.description: Positive factors that may offset concerns

supervision_available.description: Whether adequate supervision will be available for this role

organization_risk_tolerance.description: Organization's risk tolerance level (conservative, moderate, liberal)

error_messages: Invalid background status: Provide clear, conditional, or failed background check status
Invalid scores: Reference and interview scores must be between 0-100
Invalid role risk level: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid risk tolerance: Use one of [conservative, moderate, liberal]
Missing applicant ID: Provide valid applicant identifier
usage: Input all screening results including background checks, references, interviews, and role details to receive comprehensive risk assessment for volunteer placement decision.

risk_level.description: Overall assessed risk level (low, medium, high, critical)
